#summary LISPBUILDER-SDL Windows SBCL installation

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Overview =

This section describes the installation and configuration of SBCL and LISPBUILDER-SDL for Windows. Installation of Emacs is not covered.

#sidebar TableOfContents

= SBCL =

Download [http://www.sbcl.org/ SBCL] for Windows from the following location;

 * [http://www.sbcl.org/platform-table.html Latest version of SBCL for Win32]

Install [http://www.sbcl.org/ SBCL] to the following directory;

{{{
C:\sblc\
}}}

= CFFI =

Download the latest version of [http://common-lisp.net/project/cffi/ CFFI] from the following location;

 * [http://common-lisp.net/project/cffi/tarballs/?M=D CFFI]

The latest version of [http://common-lisp.net/project/cffi/ CFFI] has three dependencies that must also be downloaded;

 * [http://www.cliki.net/Alexandria ALEXANDRIA]
 * [http://www.cliki.net/Babel BABEL]
 * [http://www.cliki.net/trivial-features TRIVIAL-FEATURES]

Extract these packages to the following directories;

{{{
C:\sbcl\site\cffi\
C:\sbcl\site\alexandria\
C:\sbcl\site\babel_0.3.0\
C:\sbcl\site\trivial-features_0.3\
}}}

= LISPBUILDER-SDL & Binaries =

Download `LISPBUILDER-SDL` from *source*, or *downloads* above.
Download _win32-lispbuilder-sdl-binaries.tgz_ from *source*, or *downloads* above.

Install to the following directory;

{{{
C:\sbcl\site\lispbiulder-sdl\
}}}

Don


{{{
(require :asdf)
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\trivial-features_0.3\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)  
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\alexandria\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)    
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\babel_0.3.0\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)     
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\cffi\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)     
(asdf:operate 'asdf:load-op :cffi)
}}}

=== LISPBUILDER-SDL ===

 * SVN, or PACKAGE
 * SDL from packaged libraries, or the [www.libsdl.org official site]

{{{
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\lispbuilder-sdl\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)
(asdf:operate 'asdf:load-op :lispbuilder-sdl)
(asdf:operate 'asdf:load-op :lispbuilder-sdl-binaries)
}}}


=== sbclrc ===

{{{
(require :asdf)
 
;;load cffi
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\trivial-features_0.3\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)  
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\alexandria\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)    
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\babel_0.3.0\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)     
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\cffi\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)     
(asdf:operate 'asdf:load-op :cffi)
 
;; load lispbuilder-sdl
(pushnew "F:\\sbcl\\site\\lispbuilder-sdl\\" asdf:*central-registry* :test 'equal)
(asdf:operate 'asdf:load-op :lispbuilder-sdl)
(asdf:operate 'asdf:load-op :lispbuilder-sdl-binaries)
}}}

=== sbcl.bat ===

{{{
F:\sbcl\sbcl.exe  --core "F:\sbcl\sbcl.core" --sysinit "F:\sbcl\sbclrc"
}}}

=== Starting SBCL ===

{{{
sbcl.bat
}}}

 * [http://www.cygwin.com/ rlwrap] a readline wrapper, described [http://utopia.knoware.nl/~hlub/uck/rlwrap/ here]. Makes using SBCL from the REPL somewhat bearable.

{{{
> rlwrap sbcl.bat
}}}
